alert.note: Alert for Guadalupe Mountains of Eddy County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 27 at 9:31PM MST until March 02 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM CST /8 AM MST/ TUESDAY TO 9 PM CST /8 PM MST/ THURSDAY... * WHAT...West winds 40 to 50 mph with gusts up to 75 mph expected through Thursday morning. West winds 60 to 75 mph with gusts up to 90 mph expected Thursday afternoon. * WHERE...Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains. * WHEN...From 9 AM CST /8 AM MST/ Tuesday to 9 PM CST /8 PM MST/ Thursday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
